fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Environment, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Sport, Borders and Security, Communication
eu_initiatives: The Institute welcomes invitations from other European Organisations with whom it collaborates and take part with to calls for the protection of the environment, for the protection of rights of men and animals.
organisation_name: Istituto Europeo di Scienze Forensi e Biomediche (EFBI)
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Transnational associations and networks of public regional or other sub-national authorities
goals__remit: The Institute provides courses at any level and at affordable costs. It also provides consultancies by all its professors nd consultants which offer services in law, medicine etc... according to the minimum feees and with no profit aim. All the professors are working actively in their fields of competence and carry out activities of research working with the most important Universities in Europe.
